snippet.title: Abomi Nation: Monster Rifts — Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Battle teams of Abomis in this turn-based roguelike monster-tamer where the matchups change every run! Recruit creatures from several different indie universes to help close the rifts destroying Abomi Nation. Create your own Abomis or download others from Steam Workshop for infinite possibilities!

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3131290/Abomi_Nation_Monster_Rifts/
Follow the game on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/470424787/abomi-nation-monster-rifts-infinite-creature-crossovers/
Join the Discord: https://discord.com/invite/GTzqg2F
Follow on Twitter/X: https://x.com/orange_pylon

Big thank you to TRAGsoft (Coromon), moi rai (Monster Sanctuary), Moonsprout Games (Bug Fables), dietzribi (Toodee and Topdee), Mana Void (Rainbow Billy), Picorinne Soft (Disc Creatures), Stove Powered Games (Anode Heart), The Alekon Company (Alekon), and Sonzai Games (Super Sami Roll) for partnering with Abomi Nation: Monster Rifts and also this trailer!
